intro.heroSubtitle:
Oboe is a learning space created for you, by you.
Where every tool is designed to serve your unique learning path.
intro.flexibleToolsDesc: Freely create study cards, tests, and organize your library the way you want.
intro.clearRoadmapDesc: Track progress, review history, and bookmark favorites to never miss knowledge.
intro.supportCommunityDesc: Connect, share study materials, and learn from thousands of other users.
intro.buildKnowledgeDesc: Start from the smallest building blocks. With Oboe, you can easily create flashcard sets for vocabulary, kanji, or grammar patterns. Turn dry knowledge into vivid study materials, always ready for review.
intro.practiceRememberDesc: Learning must go hand in hand with practice. Convert any card set into diverse tests with just a few clicks. All results are saved, helping you see your progress clearly day by day.
intro.connectExchangeDesc: Join the Forum to exchange experiences, ask questions, share materials, and connect with the vibrant Japanese learning community. Learn and grow together!
intro.joinCommunity: Join the Oboe community today and experience a completely new learning method.

upgrade.title: Upgrade Account
upgrade.subtitle: Unlock unlimited creative potential and premium learning experience.
upgrade.unlockPotential: Unlock unlimited creative potential and premium learning experience.
upgrade.aiAssistantDesc: Get personalized learning guidance based on your style and progress.
upgrade.learningAnalyticsDesc: Track progress with detailed reports and receive appropriate improvement suggestions.
upgrade.smartLearningDesc: System automatically adjusts difficulty and review frequency based on your ability.
upgrade.advancedContentDesc: Access advanced vocabulary and grammar library suitable for all levels.
upgrade.testimonial1Text: "OboePro helped me significantly improve my Japanese skills. The AI assistant really understands my weaknesses."
upgrade.testimonial2Text: "Detailed progress reports help me easily track improvement and maintain learning motivation."
upgrade.ctaTitle: Ready to enhance your learning experience?
upgrade.ctaDescription: Use OboePro and discover the power of AI in learning Japanese.

free.name: Free
free.description: Basic features to start your learning journey

pro.name: Oboe Pro
pro.description: Comprehensive learning experience with AI technology

faq.answer1: You can easily upgrade your account by clicking the "Upgrade Now" button and following the payment instructions.
faq.question2: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.answer2: Yes, you can cancel your OboePro subscription at any time. Your account will maintain Pro benefits until the end of the current billing cycle.
faq.question3: Is there a free trial for OboePro?
faq.answer3: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial of OboePro so you can experience all the features.
faq.answer4: We accept payments via credit cards, PayPal, and popular e-wallets like Momo.

whyFlashcard.title: Why Learn with Flashcards?
whyFlashcard.spacedRepetitionDesc: Spaced Repetition (SR) is a learning method based on optimal intervals between reviews, helping to:
whyFlashcard.testingEffectDesc: The Testing Effect is a psychological phenomenon showing that regular knowledge testing will:
whyFlashcard.benefitsTitle: 2. Benefits of Flashcards in Japanese Learning
whyFlashcard.vocabularyBenefit1: Easily memorize new words through images and examples
whyFlashcard.vocabularyBenefit2: Learn word usage in various contexts
whyFlashcard.kanjiBenefit4: Practice kanji writing through stroke order
whyFlashcard.smartSystemFeature1: Automatically adjust review timing based on learning performance
whyFlashcard.smartSystemFeature2: Analyze and track detailed learning progress
whyFlashcard.smartSystemFeature4: Integrate standard pronunciation from native speakers
whyFlashcard.customizationFeature1: Create custom card sets by desired topics
whyFlashcard.customizationFeature3: Share card sets with the community
whyFlashcard.statistic1: 90% of users improved JLPT scores after 3 months of use
whyFlashcard.statistic2: Average of 30 new words memorized daily
whyFlashcard.statistic3: 75% higher study retention rate than traditional methods
whyFlashcard.testimonial1Quote: I passed N2 after 6 months of studying with Oboe Flashcard. This method is truly effective!
whyFlashcard.testimonial2Quote: From someone who struggled with Japanese, I can now confidently communicate with native speakers.

kanjiGuide.title: Kanji Learning Guide
kanjiGuide.section1_1Description: Radicals are basic components that make up kanji, helping with classification and lookup:
kanjiGuide.strokeOrderDesc: Correct stroke order helps with writing speed and character recognition:
kanjiGuide.onReadingDesc: Reading based on ancient Chinese pronunciation
kanjiGuide.radicalMethodDesc: Learn kanji systematically through radical components:
kanjiGuide.radicalStep1: Memorize common radicals and their meanings
kanjiGuide.radicalStep2: Understand how radicals combine to form kanji
kanjiGuide.radicalStep3: Practice writing kanji with correct stroke order
kanjiGuide.spacedRepetitionDesc: Use spaced repetition for long-term retention:
kanjiGuide.spacedStep3: Focus on difficult kanji more frequently
kanjiGuide.section4_2Method1: Write kanji following correct stroke order
kanjiGuide.tip1Description: Identify the main radical to guess the core meaning
kanjiGuide.tip2Description: Count strokes to search in dictionaries
kanjiGuide.tip3Description: Look for repeating patterns in kanji
kanjiGuide.readingMistake2: Not considering context for reading choice
kanjiGuide.readingMistake3: Memorizing only one reading per kanji

changeMethod.question: Can I change the payment method after starting the transaction?
changeMethod.answer: Yes, you can go back to the payment method selection step at any time before completing the transaction.

noEmail.question: I didn't receive the payment confirmation email?
noEmail.answer: Confirmation emails are usually sent within 5 minutes. Please check your spam folder or contact support if you haven't received it.

whenUpgrade.question: When will my account be upgraded to Premium?
whenUpgrade.answer: Your account will be upgraded immediately after successful payment.

shareAccount.question: Can I share my Premium account with others?
shareAccount.answer: No, each Premium account is for use by one person only.

flashcards.title: 2.1. Learning with Flashcards
flashcards.description: Oboe provides a smart flashcard system that helps you:

features.customization: Customize card sets according to needs

systems.hiragana: Hiragana („Å≤„Çâ„Åå„Å™): Curved, soft characters for native Japanese words
systems.katakana: Katakana („Ç´„Çø„Ç´„Éä): Straight, angular characters for foreign words
systems.kanji: Kanji (Êº¢Â≠ó): Chinese characters with specific meanings

roles.title: 1.2. Roles in Sentences
roles.hiragana: Hiragana: Write verb endings, particles, native Japanese words
roles.katakana: Katakana: Foreign words, foreign names, scientific terms
roles.kanji: Kanji: Express the main meaning of words

features.diacritics: Use diacritical marks for sound changes (dakuten, handakuten)
features.strokeOrder: Written according to specific stroke order rules

features.longVowels: Long vowels often written with dash mark („Éº)

uses.foreignNames: Foreign personal names and place names
